sourcesContent:
import { Image,Row,Col,ListGroup,Card,Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import products from "../products"; //My Components import Rating from '../Components/Rating' function Productscreen({match}) { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return(
Go Back {product.name} ₹{product.price} {product.description} Price ₹{product.price} Status {product.countInStock? 'In stock': 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default Productscreen
